_description: Model selector for sub-agents. Called ONLY when the agent has decided to spawn — NOT for routing all messages.
_role: Analyzes task complexity → recommends Opus (complex) or Sonnet (normal)
_workflow: Agent decides to delegate → calls task-router → gets model recommendation → spawns sub-agent

normal_tasks.description: Standard tasks: writing, searching, file modifications, deploys, configuration

complex_tasks.description: Complex tasks: code creation, debugging, architecture, multi-step technical work

protection_mode.rule: When active, Opus → Sonnet downgrade for non-critical tasks
